traits.locale_text: Простите.... Из за дождя дорогу размыло, в гору тащить....

languages.text: "Простите, господин... Из-за дождя дорогу размыло, в гору тащить пришлось..."
"I'm sorry, sir. The rain washed away the road, so I had to drag it uphill..."
languages.original_text: "Простите, господин... Из-за дождя дорогу размыло, в гору тащить пришлось..."

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry, sir. The rain washed away the road, so I had to drag it uphill..."
"I'm sorry, sir. The rain washed away the road, so I had to drag it uphill..."
"I'm sorry, sir. The rain washed away the road, so I had to drag it uphill..."
"I'm sorry, sir. The rain washed away the road, so I had to drag it uphill..."
"I'm sorry, sir. The rain washed away the road, so I had to drag it uphill..."

languages.text: "Es tut mir leid, Sir. Der Regen hat die Straße weggespült, und ich musste ihn raufziehen ..."
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, sir. The rain washed away the road, so I had to drag it uphill..."

traits.locale_text: "Es tut mir leid, Sir. Der Regen hat die Straße weggespült, und ich musste ihn raufziehen ..."

languages.text: « Toutes mes excuses, messire. La route étant inondée, j'ai dû traîner le chariot jusqu'ici à bout de bras... »
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, sir. The rain washed away the road, so I had to drag it uphill..."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes mes excuses, messire. La route étant inondée, j'ai dû traîner le chariot jusqu'ici à bout de bras... »

languages.text: “实在抱歉，大人。大雨冲毁了道路，我不得不把车子拖到山上……”
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, sir. The rain washed away the road, so I had to drag it uphill..."

traits.locale_text: “实在抱歉，大人。大雨冲毁了道路，我不得不把车子拖到山上……”

languages.text: «Lo siento, señor. La lluvia deshizo el camino, así que tuve que subirlo por la colina...».
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, sir. The rain washed away the road, so I had to drag it uphill..."

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento, señor. La lluvia deshizo el camino, así que tuve que subirlo por la colina...».

languages.text: 「旦那様、申し訳ありません。雨で道が流されてしまったので、坂を引きずって運ばなければなりませんでした…」
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, sir. The rain washed away the road, so I had to drag it uphill..."

traits.locale_text: 「旦那様、申し訳ありません。雨で道が流されてしまったので、坂を引きずって運ばなければなりませんでした…」

languages.text: "Üzgünüm efendim. Yağmur yüzünden yollar ıslak, dolayısıyla yokuş yukarı sürüklemek zorunda kaldım..."
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, sir. The rain washed away the road, so I had to drag it uphill..."

traits.locale_text: "Üzgünüm efendim. Yağmur yüzünden yollar ıslak, dolayısıyla yokuş yukarı sürüklemek zorunda kaldım..."
